Standalone NBU home made appliance

  • Mount the virtual media on iLO Virtual Media
    • HP DL3*
      • Login to the iLO
        ssh LAN@${shortname}rmb

        Use the standard password for “LAN”.

      • Mount the Media
        vm cdrom insert http://pcdcunxlxap01.driv.com/servers/HOSTNAME.iso
vm cdrom set connect

        Replace HOSTNAME with the actual hostname you are building.

    • DELL Power Ridge
      • Login to iDRAC
        ssh root@${shortname}rmb
      • Login to iDRAC
        ssh LAN@${shortname}rmb
      • Disconnect any previous connections
        racadm vmdisconnect
      • Connect the media
        racadm remoteimage -c -l http://pcdcunxlxap01.driv.com/servers/HOSTNAME.iso

        Replace HOSTNAME with the actual hostname you are building.

  • Login to the Remote Console https://HOSTNAMErmb –> Login with LAN –> Remote console
  • Power on the server Virtual Power
  • When the system boots –> At the BIOS screen –> Press “F11” –>
    • HP DL3
      • Select the Virtual CDROM to boot from –> Hit enter.
    • DELL Power Ridge
      • Select EUFI Boot –> Select Virtual DVD Device
  • At the grub menu, it will display the HOSTNAME –> hit enter to start the installation.
  • Proceed to post install steps
